sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_e5b56029dba30300c2357d9ebf961982
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>Sync Attachment to Partner Instance</name><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[var filter = gs.getProperty('sync_attatchment_int.attachmentsToSync.filter');

var attachmentsToSync = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
attachmentsToSync.addEncodedQuery(filter);
attachmentsToSync.query();

while(attachmentsToSync.next()){
	cp_attachment_utils.outboundAddAttachment(attachmentsToSync);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-08 20:32:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>e5b56029dba30300c2357d9ebf961982</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sync Attachment to Partner Instance</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e5b56029dba30300c2357d9ebf961982</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-08 20:32:38</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0eeedf55db230300c2357d9ebf961906
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.cp_attachment_utils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>cp_attachment_utils</name><script><![CDATA[var cp_attachment_utils = Class.create();
cp_attachment_utils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'cp_attachment_utils'
};

cp_attachment_utils.outboundAddAttachment = function(attachment_gr) {

    //Convert Attachment to b64
    var attachmentBase64string = cp_attachment_utils.getBase64(attachment_gr.sys_id.toString());
    var record_sysID = attachment_gr.table_sys_id;
    var record_tableName = attachment_gr.table_name
    var attachmentTable = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
    attachmentTable.get('name', record_tableName);
    var record_table_sysID = attachmentTable.sys_id.toString();

    // Build Outbound Object
    var outbound_object = {
        u_file_name: attachment_gr.file_name+ '',
        u_content_type: attachment_gr.content_type+ '',
        u_table_name: record_tableName + '',
        u_table_sysid: record_table_sysID + '',
        u_record: record_sysID + '',
        u_attachment: attachmentBase64string + ''
    };

    var responseObj = cp_attachment_utils.sendAttachment(outbound_object);
    gs.info(JSON.stringify(responseObj))
};

cp_attachment_utils.sendAttachment = function(outbound_object) {
    var responseObj = {};
    try {
        // Set up creds for integration
        var ge = new GlideEncrypter();
        var instance = gs.getProperty('sync_attatchment_int.partner_instance.instance');
        var user = gs.getProperty('sync_attatchment_int.partner_instance.user');
        var password = ge.decrypt(gs.getProperty('sync_attatchment_int.partner_instance.password'));
        var payloadString = JSON.stringify(outbound_object)
        // Send Request 
        var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        request.setEndpoint('https://' + instance + '.service-now.com/api/now/table/u_sync_attachment');
        request.setHttpMethod('POST');
        request.setBasicAuth(user, password);
        request.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
        request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        request.setRequestBody(payloadString);
        var respBody;
        var response;


        try {
            response = request.execute();
            respBody = response.getBody();
            gs.info('response: ' + response);
            gs.info('respBody: ' + respBody)
        } catch (err) {
            responseObj.u_error = 'Error executing Webservice: ' + err;
        }

        responseObj.u_payload = payloadString;
        responseObj.u_result = respBody;
        if (respBody.match(/^\{\"error\"/)) {
            responseObj.u_error = respBody;
            responseObj.u_status = 'error';
        } else {
            responseObj.u_status = 'processed';
        }
    } catch (err) {

        responseObj.u_error = 'Error building Webservice: ' + err;
        responseObj.u_status = 'error';
    }
    return responseObj;
};

cp_attachment_utils.getBase64 = function(attachment_sysID) {

    var b64attachment = false;

    // get  stream 
    var attachmentIS = new GlideSysAttachmentInputStream(attachment_sysID);
    var bytearrayOS = new Packages.java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream();
    // obtain byte stream 
    attachmentIS.writeTo(bytearrayOS);
    // encode attachment file using Base64 algorithm 
    b64attachment = GlideBase64.encode(bytearrayOS.toByteArray());

    var b64String = new String(b64attachment);
    return b64String.replace(/(?:\r\n|\r|\n)/g, "");
};




cp_attachment_utils.inboundAddAttatchment = function(inbound_Attachment_gr) {

    var mappingObj = JSON.parse(gs.getProperty('sync_attatchment_int.partner_instance.mapping'))
    var recordToBeAttachedTo = new GlideRecord(inbound_Attachment_gr.u_table_name)
    gs.info(mappingObj[inbound_Attachment_gr.u_record])
    if (recordToBeAttachedTo.get(mappingObj[inbound_Attachment_gr.u_record])) {
        gs.info(recordToBeAttachedTo+":"+inbound_Attachment_gr.u_file_name+":"+inbound_Attachment_gr.u_content_type)


        var StringUtil = GlideStringUtil;
        var sa = new GlideSysAttachment();
        var attachmentId = sa.write(recordToBeAttachedTo,inbound_Attachment_gr.u_file_name,inbound_Attachment_gr.u_content_type,StringUtil.base64DecodeAsBytes(inbound_Attachment_gr.u_attachment));

    } else {
        gs.info('No record match found')
    }
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-08 15:20:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>0eeedf55db230300c2357d9ebf961906</sys_id><sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cp_attachment_utils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0eeedf55db230300c2357d9ebf961906</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-08 18:54:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
